Sentencas: A solid oxide cell-based energy system is proposed for a solar-powered stand-alone building.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: The system is comprised of a 5 kW(el) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a 9.5 kW(el) solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC), and the required balance of plant.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: The SOFC supplies: 1 building demand in the absence of sufficient solar power, 2-heat for SOEC in endothermic and standby modes.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: Thermal integration of SOFC and SOEC is implemented through a network of heat exchangers, combined with set of control algorithms.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: Two control strategies were implemented to actuate the SOFC in response to endothermic heat demands of SOEC by manipulating: 1-electric power, 2-fuel utilization.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: The results of dynamic simulation of system for two scenarios (sunny day and cloudy day) showed successful compliance of temperature constraints with both methods.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building

Sentencas: Manipulation of fuel utilization, however, resulted in better system performance in terms of efficiency and H-2 balance.
Titulo: Dynamics and control of a thermally self-sustaining energy storage system using integrated solid oxide cells for an islanded building
